name: 心理學名著選讀
goals: Understand the psychological theories and studies that have essential impacts, including the background, important discoveries, scholarly evaluations, and the follow-up development
Acquire English reading and discussion skills.
Inspire a global vision to understand and appreciate the value and contribution of psychological sciences
syllabus:
1\. Past for present: psychology in search of a paradigm 

2\. One brain or two 

3\. Watch out for the visual cliff 

4\. Salivating dogs 

5\. Emotional Albert 

6\. Superstitious 

7\. American functionalism 

8\. The Gestalt movement 

9\. Chomsky 

10\. Aggression 

11\. Pygmalion Effect 

12\. Cognitive Maps 

13\. The nature of love 

14\. Locus of control 

15\. Mechanisms of defense 

16\. Learned helplessness
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
